title: The Blood Wars: Crystal Secret
description: Aecia has enjoyed her freedom as a human for only a few short months when her uncle Kasen goes missing! Fearing the worst, she embarks on yet another dangerous quest with her family and friends, and they are hurtled into a conflict which will become as historic as The Great War, in which the bloodthirsty vamps were the absolute victors. These are the first battles of The Blood Wars, and the secrets they uncover will terrify Aecia's soul, and plunge her into an age of confusion, life-threatening danger, and quivering doubts about the one truth she holds as sacred inside her heart; the fact that she is human?
author: Maria Bradley
